argument.description: An expression that specifies the string that is to be searched for.
An expression that specifies the string that is to be searched for.
An expression that specifies the string that is to be searched for.

description: The POSITION function returns the starting position of the first occurrence of one string within another string.
sample:
SELECT RECEIVED, SUBJECT, POSITION('GOOD BEER', NOTE_TEXT, OCTETS)
   FROM IN_TRAY
   WHERE POSITION('GOOD BEER', NOTE_TEXT, OCTETS) <> 0
